raw_comment:
I notice that in every league the head coach's percentage always stays under 45%. Also i noticed that basketball has the most color diversity.

I wonder why baseball doesn't have as much color diversity as the other sports.
ace_sentences: I notice that in every league the percentage of the head coach always stays under 45 percent.
I notice that basketball has the most color diversity.
I wonder why baseball does not have as much color diversity as the other sports.
